content: गौण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [गुणमधिकृत्य प्रवृत्ता गौणी, तत आगतः अण्] {@--1@} Subordinate, secondary, unessential. {@--2@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Indirect or less immediate (<ab>opp.</ab> मुख्य or प्रधान); गौणे कर्मणि दुह्यादेः प्रधाने नीहृकृष्वहां <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--3@} Figurative, metaphorical, used in a secondary sense (as a word or sense). {@--4@} Founded on some resemblance between the primary and secondary sense of a word; as in गौणीलक्षणा. {@--5@} Relating to enumeration or multiplication. {@--6@} Attributive.
